string-array.name: welcome_carousel_text
string-array.item: You downloaded the MyScience App from the Google Play Store
Within the MyScience App you will go through the following steps
You read through the consent form and sign it
You sign into your Smart4Health account and connect the MyScience App
In addition to the core data set, you can select additional data from your Smart4Health account to be provided to the Research Platform
You confirm the data provision of the core data set and the potentially selected optional data before it is uploaded
We remove identifying information from your data
The MyScience App adds a code to your data
The code is stored only in your MyScience App
We store the coded data in the Research Platform
